examples: S example: Deschampsia pacifica Tatew. & Kobayasi, J. Fac. Agric. Hokkaido Imp. Univ. 36: 97. 1934; M example: Xylaria ponapeana Kobayasi, Acta phytotax. geobot., Kyoto 33: 203. 1982; A example: Melosira arentii (R.W. Kolbe) T. Nagumo & Kobayasi (1977)
